org.apache.giraph.bsp

类 BspService<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.giraph.bsp.BspService<I,V,E,M>
  • 类型参数:
    I - Vertex id
    V - Vertex data
    E - Edge data
    M - Message data
    所有已实现的接口:
    CentralizedService<I,V,E,M>, org.apache.zookeeper.Watcher
    直接已知子类:
    BspServiceMaster, BspServiceWorker

    public abstract class BspService<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
extends Object
implements org.apache.zookeeper.Watcher, CentralizedService<I,V,E,M>
    Zookeeper-based implementation of CentralizedService.

    • 嵌套类概要

      • 从接口继承的嵌套类/接口 org.apache.zookeeper.Watcher

        org.apache.zookeeper.Watcher.Event

      • CHECKPOINT_FINALIZED_POSTFIX

        public static final String CHECKPOINT_FINALIZED_POSTFIX
        If at the end of a checkpoint file, indicates the stitched checkpoint file prefixes. A checkpoint is not valid if this file does not exist.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

        参数:
        serverPortList - ZooKeeper server port list
        sessionMsecTimeout - ZooKeeper session timeount in milliseconds
        context - Mapper context
        graphTaskManager - GraphTaskManager for this compute node

      • getRestartedSuperstep

        public final long getRestartedSuperstep()
        从接口复制的说明: CentralizedService
        Get the restarted superstep
        指定者:
        getRestartedSuperstep 在接口中 CentralizedService<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
        返回:
        -1 if not manually restarted, otherwise the superstep id

      • setRestartedSuperstep

        public final void setRestartedSuperstep(long superstep)
        Set the restarted superstep
        参数:
        superstep - Set the manually restarted superstep

      • checkpointFrequencyMet

        public final boolean checkpointFrequencyMet(long superstep)
        Should checkpoint on this superstep? If checkpointing, always checkpoint the first user superstep. If restarting, the first checkpoint is after the frequency has been met.
        指定者:
        checkpointFrequencyMet 在接口中 CentralizedService<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
        参数:
        superstep - Decide if checkpointing no this superstep
        返回:
        True if this superstep should be checkpointed, false otherwise

      • getJobState

        public final org.json.JSONObject getJobState()
        Get the master commanded job state as a JSONObject. Also sets the watches to see if the master commanded job state changes.
        返回:
        Last job state or null if none
        抛出:
        InterruptedException
        org.apache.zookeeper.KeeperException

      • getJobId

        public final String getJobId()
        Get the job id
        返回:
        job id

        public final long getApplicationAttempt()
        Get the latest application attempt and cache it.
        返回:
        the latest application attempt

      • incrCachedSuperstep

        public final void incrCachedSuperstep()
        Increment the cached superstep. Shouldn't be the initial value anymore.

      • setCachedSuperstep

        public final void setCachedSuperstep(long superstep)
        Set the cached superstep (should only be used for loading checkpoints or recovering from failure).
        参数:
        superstep - will be used as the next superstep iteration

      • setApplicationAttempt

        public final void setApplicationAttempt(long applicationAttempt)
        Set the cached application attempt (should only be used for restart from failure by the master)
        参数:
        applicationAttempt - Will denote the new application attempt

      • registerBspEvent

        public void registerBspEvent(BspEvent event)
        Register a BspEvent. Ensure that it will be signaled by catastrophic failure so that threads waiting on an event signal will be unblocked.
        参数:
        event - Event to be registered.

      • getGraphPartitionerFactory

        protected GraphPartitionerFactory<I,V,E,M> getGraphPartitionerFactory()
        Subclasses can use this to instantiate their respective partitioners
        返回:
        Instantiated graph partitioner factory

      • processEvent

        protected boolean processEvent(org.apache.zookeeper.WatchedEvent event)
        Derived classes that want additional ZooKeeper events to take action should override this.
        参数:
        event - Event that occurred
        返回:
        true if the event was processed here, false otherwise
